casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Carlos RODRIGUEZ 302A14-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Barbara S. Blackman, Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellate Defenders, John F. Carella, Staff Attorney, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jennifer Martin, Patrick B. Weede, Michael Silver, Assistant District Attorneys, Mary Carla Babb, Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney Generals, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of September 2017 by Defendant Requesting Court to Take Judicial Notice:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
